name: Aliens versus Predator
summary: Aliens versus Predator is a 1999 science fiction first-person shooter video game developed by Rebellion Developments and published by Electronic Arts for Microsoft Windows and Mac OS X. It is a part of the Alien and Predator crossover franchise, Alien vs. Predator. A sequel, Aliens versus Predator 2, was developed by Monolith Productions and released by Sierra in 2001.
info:
• 中文名: 异形大战铁血战士
  • 开发: Rebellion
  • 别名: Aliens versus Predator Classic 2000
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: FPS
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 1999年4月30日
  • 发行: Fox Interactive
